description: The Classima WordPress theme before 2.1.11 and some of its required plugins (Classified Listing before 2.2.14, Classified Listing Pro before 2.0.20, Classified Listing Store & Membership before 1.4.20 and Classima Core before 1.10) do not escape a parameter before outputting it back in attributes, leading to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting

product.name: Classified Listing Pro - Classified ads & Business Directory Plugin
Classified Listing – Classified ads & Business Directory Plugin
